name: Snowmobile Stickman: Flip Race
description:
Get ready to ride on a snowmobile with stickman in our new flippy simulator. Our simulator of snowmobile race is now has stickman. Perform flips and ride through hooks of road on your snowmobile in flippy simulator and throw snow balls in your rivals. Rush through the road on your snowmobile and become the first in the race. Rush on your snowmobile and perform flips on your way to the finish line of the race. Ride carefully on hooks and let your stickman throw some snowballs into your rivals. Rush as fast as you can, perform double and triple flips, impeccably complete hooks and complete the race first to show everyone that you are the real master of snowmobile ride. Forget about everything in our new simulator: Snowmobile Stickman: Flip Race.

In this flippy simulator, you have one simple target: complete the race first. While your stickman is rushing, you can perform flips on snow hills and trampolines. Just tap the screen with your finger to start flipping and release to stop flipping. In our simulator, we have many hooks on the road, so make your stickman complete them impeccably. Start your race and rush through the road on your flippy snowmobile, leave every rival behind, throw snowballs in them and perform flips on your way. Share this flippy simulator with your friends and find out who is the fastest one. Can you perform more flips than your friend can? Find the answer in our new flippy simulator. Forget about everything in our new simulator, throw snowballs in your rivals, complete the race first on your snowmobile, complete every hook of the road and show everyone who the master of flips on a snowmobile is.

Snowmobile Stickman: Flip Race is a free to play simulator of rushing through a snowfield. Rush on your snowmobile and perform flips on your way to the finish line of the race. Flip as many times as you can. Collect coins and upgrade your snowmobile or buy a new one, more powerful. Leave all rivals behind, throw snowballs in them and complete the race first, complete every hook of the road and ride to the finish line. Call your friends and together ride through the snowfield on your flippy snowmobiles. Find out who will complete the ride first. Become the real master of snowmobile ride in our new flippy simulator. Download our free simulator and start snowmobile race with your stickman.
